hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util

Class OriginalObservableWrapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util.OriginalObservableWrapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the reactive-observer's type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CloseableObservable<T>, Observable<T>, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class OriginalObservableWrapper<T>
extends Observable
implements CloseableObservable<T>
    Helper class that wraps a Java Observable and makes its services availabel as java- and reactive- observable. Data incoming through the observer interfaces are routed to the underlying java-observable. The class implements Observable<Object>, therefore reactive-observers can be registered as well.
    Since:
    0.97
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2013.01.11.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OriginalObservableWrapper(Observable observable)
      Wraps the given observable and sets a close action to remove all observers.
      OriginalObservableWrapper(Observable observable, Action0 action)
      Wraps the given observable which calls the supplied action in case of a close event and unregisters all observables.
      OriginalObservableWrapper(Observable observable, Action0 closeAction, boolean unregisterAll)
      Wraps the given observable and sets up this observable to call the closeAction on close() and remove all registered observers if unregisterAll is true.
      OriginalObservableWrapper(Observable observable, Action0E<? extends IOException> action)
      Wraps the given observable which calls the supplied action in case of a close event and unregisters all observables.
      OriginalObservableWrapper(Observable observable, Action0E<? extends IOException> closeAction, boolean unregisterAll)
      Wraps the given observable and sets up this observable to call the closeAction on close() and remove all registered observers if unregisterAll is true.

      • register

        @Nonnull
public Closeable register(@Nonnull
                         Observer observer)
        Registers a java-observer and returns a handle to it. The observer can be unregistered via this handle or the regular deleteObserver().

        The convenience method is to have symmetric means for both observer kinds to interact with this observable.

        Parameters:
        observer - the observer to register
        Returns:
        the unregistration handle
